message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $11,500. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your perspective, but $9,800 is quite a bit lower than what I'm hoping for.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,900? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. Would you be willing to consider $10,200?
